overview: From 2025-11-28 to 2025-11-29, ethereum-optimism/optimism had 6 new PRs (1 merged), 0 new issues, and 13 active contributors.

topIssues.title: op deployer with custom intent (faultGameClockExtension, faultGameMaxClockDuration)  reverts
topIssues.author: InoMurko
topIssues.body:
My guess is that op deployer for some reason does not like modified   
faultGameClockExtension = 3600
faultGameMaxClockDuration = 14400

because if standard are used, then deployment works:
  faultGameClockExtension = 10800
  faultGameMaxClockDuration = 302400


**Bug Description**
Using op-deployer with a custom intent file:
```
configType = "custom"
l1ChainID = 84532
fundDevAccounts = false
l1ContractsLocator = "https://storage.googleapis.com/oplabs-contract-artifacts/artifacts-v1-b112b16f8939fbb732c0693de3d3bd1e8e3e2f0771f91d5ab300a6c9b7b1af73.tar.gz"
l2ContractsLocator = "https://storage.googleapis.com/oplabs-contract-artifacts/artifacts-v1-b112b16f8939fbb732c0693de3d3bd1e8e3e2f0771f91d5ab300a6c9b7b1af73.tar.gz"

[superchainRoles]
  SuperchainProxyAdminOwner = "0x4da3c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f2fbf"
  SuperchainGuardian = "0x4da3c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f2fbf"
  ProtocolVersionsOwner = "0x4da3c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f2fbf"
  Challenger = "0x267dbd8ed34722e59639224ae3c5360a46328403"

[[chains]]
  id = "0x00000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000002dddf153b"
  baseFeeVaultRecipient = "0x4da3c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f2fbf"
  l1FeeVaultRecipient = "0x4da3c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f2fbf"
  sequencerFeeVaultRecipient = "0x4da3c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f2fbf"
  eip1559DenominatorCanyon = 250
  eip1559Denominator = 50
  eip1559Elasticity = 6
  gasLimit = 60000000
  operatorFeeScalar = 0
  operatorFeeConstant = 0
  minBaseFee = 0
  daFootprintGasScalar = 0
  [chains.roles]
    l1ProxyAdminOwner = "0x4da3c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f2fbf"
    l2ProxyAdminOwner = "0x5eb4c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f40d0"
    systemConfigOwner = "0x4da3c5d00ffd28c0c1b8f92d1720e722ea5f2fbf"
    unsafeBlockSigner = "0xefd8e9ebae282bae1dd40e652dcdaac46f7224fb"
    batcher = "0xa41d05ec16b7dda06d2a2d8a8e71f5b29ec35e17"
    proposer = "0x1b64b552198a5de772de6026e1167bb5d68f022c"

  [chains.deployOverrides]
    baseFeeVaultMinimumWithdrawalAmount = "0xde0b6b3a7640000"
    baseFeeVaultWithdrawalNetwork = "remote"
    eip1559Denominator = 50
    enableGovernance = false
    gasPriceOracleBaseFeeScalar = 1101
    gasPriceOracleBlobBaseFeeScalar = 659851
    l1FeeVaultMinimumWithdrawalAmount = "0xde0b6b3a7640000"
    l1FeeVaultWithdrawalNetwork = "remote"
    l2GenesisBlockGasLimit = "0x1c9c380"
    sequencerFeeVaultMinimumWithdrawalAmount = "0xde0b6b3a7640000"
    sequencerFeeVaultWithdrawalNetwork = "remote"

[globalDeployOverrides]
  channelTimeoutBedrock = 300
  dangerouslyAllowCustomDisputeParameters = true
  disputeGameFinalityDelaySeconds = 6
  faultGameAbsolutePrestate = "0x038512e02c4c3f7bdaec27d00edf55b7155e0905301e1a88083e4e0a6764d54c"

  faultGameSplitDepth = 30
  faultGameWithdrawalDelay = 1200

  l1BlockTime = 2.0
  l2BlockTime = "1"
  l2GenesisCanyonTimeOffset = "0x0"

  l2GenesisEcotoneTimeOffset = "0x0"

  l2GenesisRegolithTimeOffset = "0x0"
  maxSequencerDrift = 3600

  respectedGameType = 1

```

```
{
  "version": 1,
  "create2Salt": "0x76569cb1c4458a1c5603366c1ff403893c3af1de18e15aa68f8fa5a2fa31d9d0",
```

topPRs.title: op-challenger: Remove TraceType and just use GameType.
topPRs.author: ajsutton
topPRs.body:
**Description**
Remove TraceType and just use GameType.

Rename --trace-type to --game-types with an alias to preserve backwards compatibility.

Each trace type already directly maps to a GameType and the concept of a "trace" only exists for fault dispute games.

**Tests**

Mostly covered by existing tests with a couple added to ensure GameType has a suitable String() implementation and that the `--trace-type` alias works correctly.

**Additional context**

Builds on #18432 

**Metadata**

#18321

topPRs.title: contracts: Replace mock contracts with vm.mock functions
topPRs.author: maurelian
topPRs.body:
Removes usages of two contracts in Callers.sol which can be easily replaced with foundry's builtin vm functionality. 

There is one contract left in Callers.sol, which is `GasBurner`. I cannot find a good replacement for it in Vm.Sol.

topPRs.author: falcorocks
topPRs.body:
- **Replace Reverter contract with vm.mockCallRevert()**
- **Replace Call Recorder with vm.expectCall()**
- **fix imports**
- **Fix selector data on recipient**
- **Rename Callers to GasBurner**
- **add x**
- **add y**
- **touch z**
- **e**
